Sentencas: A thermodynamic evaluation of different energy conversion chains based on centralized biomass gasification and decentralized heat and power production by a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been performed.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: Three different chains have been evaluated, the main difference between the chains is the secondary fuel produced via biomass gasification.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: The secondary fuels considered are hydrogen, synthetic natural gas (SNG) and syngas.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: These fuels are assumed to be distributed through a transport and distribution grid to the micro-combined heat and power (mu-CHP) systems based on a SOFC and a heat pump.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: Two systems for the generation of secondary fuels from biomass are modelled using Cycle-Tempo.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: The hydrogen plant and the syngas plant have been modelled.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: The efficiency of the synthetic natural gas plant is taken from literature.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: The mu-CHP systems on the different fuels have also been modelled in Cycle-Tempo.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: The chain from biomass based centralized gas production towards decentralized heat and power production has been evaluated.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass

Sentencas: The overall exergy efficiency from biomass to heat and power is for the hydrogen route 21.1%, for the SNG route it is 28.4 and for the syngas route it is 30.4%.
Titulo: Decentralized generation of electricity with solid oxide fuel cells from centrally converted biomass
